SCTX - Script Source:
scn fbmwbmColonyScript
short colonystate
short colonyService
short dayspassed
short startday
short servday
short estate1
short estate2
short estate3
short test
begin gamemode

;message "colonystate is %.2f" colonystate
;message "colonyService is %.2f" colonyService
;message "dayspassed is %.2f" dayspassed
;message "startday is %.2f" startday
;message "servday is %.2f" servday

	if  test == 1

		if servday==0&&getstage fbmwco4>0
			set servday to GameDaysPassed
		endif

		if dayspassed - servday>3&&colonyservice<3&&colonyservice!=0
			if colonyservice==1
				Message "Construction on the colony has progressed."
				set colonyService to 3
			elseif colonyservice==2
				Message "Construction on the colony has progressed."
				set colonyService to 4
			endif
		endif

		if dayspassed - servday>5&&getstage fbmwco4<80
			if colonyservice==3
;message "Construction on the colony has progressed."
				SetStage fbmwCO4 80
			elseif colonyservice==4
;message "Construction on the colony has progressed."
				SetStage fbmwCO4 90
			endif
		endif

		if GetStage fbmwCO1<1
			return
		endif

		set dayspassed to GameDaysPassed
		if colonystate==0
			set startday to GameDaysPassed
			set colonystate to 1
;message "Construction on the colony has progressed."
		endif

		if colonystate==1
			if dayspassed - startday>=3
				set colonystate to 2
				set startday to GameDaysPassed
;message "Construction on the colony has progressed."
			endif
		endif

		if colonystate==2
			if GetStage fbmwco2>=90
				if dayspassed - startday>=3
					set colonystate to 3
					set startday to GameDaysPassed
;message "Construction on the colony has progressed."
				endif
			endif
		endif

		if colonystate==4
			if dayspassed - startday>=3
				set colonystate to 5
				set startday to GameDaysPassed
;message "Construction on the colony has progressed."
			endif
		endif

		if colonystate==9
			set startday to GameDaysPassed
			if GameDaysPassed - startday>=3
				set colonystate to 10
;message "Construction on the colony has progressed."
			endif
		endif

		if colonystate==11
			if dayspassed - startday>=3
				set colonystate to 12
;message "Construction on the colony has progressed."
				set startday to GameDaysPassed
			endif
		endif

		if colonystate==13
			set startday to GameDaysPassed
		endif
		if GameDaysPassed - startday>=3 && colonystate == 13
			set colonystate to 20
			Message "Construction on the colony has progressed."
		endif


		if colonystate==20
			if GetStage fbmwco12a==50||getstage fbmwco12==110
				set startday to GameDaysPassed
				if GameDaysPassed - startday>=2
					set colonystate to 21
;message "Construction on the colony has progressed."
					set startday to GameDaysPassed
				endif
			endif
		endif

		if colonystate==23
			if dayspassed - startday>=3
				set colonystate to 30
;message "Construction on the colony has progressed."
			endif
		endif

		if estate1==1 && GetStage fbmwCOEstate < 40
			SetStage fbmwCOEstate 40
			set startday to GameDaysPassed
		endif
		if GameDaysPassed - startday>=2 && colonystate < 31 && estate1==1
			set colonystate to 31
			set startday to GameDaysPassed
		endif
		if GameDaysPassed - startday >=3 && colonystate == 31
			set colonystate to 34
			SetStage fbmwCOEstate 50
		endif

		if estate2==1 && GetStage fbmwCOEstate < 40
			SetStage fbmwCOEstate 40
			set startday to GameDaysPassed
		endif
		if GameDaysPassed - startday>=2 && colonystate < 32 && estate2==1
			set colonystate to 32
			set startday to GameDaysPassed
		endif
		if GameDaysPassed - startday >=3 && colonystate == 32
			set colonystate to 35
			SetStage fbmwCOEstate 50
		endif

		if estate3==1 && GetStage fbmwCOEstate < 40
			SetStage fbmwCOEstate 40
			set startday to GameDaysPassed
		endif
		if GameDaysPassed - startday>=2 && colonystate < 33 && estate3==1
			set colonystate to 33
			set startday to GameDaysPassed
		endif
		if GameDaysPassed - startday >=3 && colonystate == 33
			set colonystate to 36
			SetStage fbmwCOEstate 50
		endif

	endif


end
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 0 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>

CD CD CD CD CD CD CD

CD CD CD CD CD CD CD
